name: Rescue
text: Rapid Responder — [star] Response: After you use your basic DEF, make a basic thwart or attack without exhausting Rescue. “How do I feel, Tony? Invincible.”

name: Pepper Potts
text: Executive — Action: Each player may discard 1 card from their hand to search their deck for a [[tech]] upgrade and add it to their hand. (Limit once per round.) “Do you know why I've given so much of my life to Tony Stark? It's because I believe in him.”

name: Iron Man
text: [star] Interrupt: When Iron Man uses a basic power, spend 1 resource of any type → Iron Man gets +2 to that basic power for that use. “Modesty has never been my strong suit. But then, my "strong suit" is literally a strong suit.”

name: Magnetic Restraints
text: Hero Action: Choose one: • Stun an enemy. • Choose an attachment with the text "Hero Action" or "Hero Response" and discard it. “Magnetic restraint field. That'll lock you down.” —Rescue

name: Repulsor Blasts
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. This attack gains ranged. Spend X [energy] resources (to a maximum of 3) → repeat this attack X times against targets of your choosing. “I'm not a violent person, but I can't let you hurt innocent people.” —Rescue

name: Responsive
text: Hero Response: After you use a basic power, ready Rescue. You get +1 to a basic power of your choice (THW, ATK or DEF) until the end of the round. “My reaction time and reflexes are enhanced beyond human limits. I'm literally a rapid responder.” —Rescue

name: Search and Rescue
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If there is a crisis icon ([crisis]) in play, remove 2 additional threat from that scheme and this thwart ignores the crisis icon. “H.A.P.P.Y., run the search-and-rescue scan for heartbeats.” —Rescue

name: Stark Resilient
text: Resource: Exhaust Stark Resilient → generate a [wild] resource for any player. “I hereby irrevocably make you CEO of the company.” —Tony Stark

name: First Responder
text: Uses (3 medical counters). Hero Response: After another character takes damage, exhaust this card and remove 1 medical counter from it → heal 1 damage from that character (2 damage instead if they are an identity).

name: Magnetic Deflector
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When an enemy initiates an attack, discard the top card of your deck → that enemy gets -1 ATK for that attack. (Limit twice per round.) “That gun won't do anything against this suit.” —Rescue

name: Model V Chassis
text: You get +3 hit points. Hero Response: After you defend and take no damage, exhaust Model V Chassis and spend 1 resource of any type → give Rescue a tough status card. “Ultra durable. Top of the line.” —Tony Stark

name: Model V Helmet
text: Rescue gets +1 THW and ignores the patrol keyword. Hero Response (thwart): After a side scheme enters play, exhaust Model V Helmet → remove 1 threat from that scheme (2 threat instead if a crisis icon ([crisis]) is in play).

name: Repulsor Gauntlets
text: Rescue gets +1 ATK. Hero Interrupt: When Rescue makes a basic attack, exhaust Repulsor Gauntlets → that attack gains ranged. “I don't want to hurt you, but you leave me no choice.” —Rescue
